title: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator Download Direct
description: Be the leader of red and blue wobblers from ancient lands, spooky places, and fantasy worlds. Watch them fight in simulations made with the wobbliest physics system ever created. TABS When you grow tired of the 100+ wobblers at your disposal you can make new ones in the unit creator. You can also send wobblers to fight your friends or strangers in online multiplayer

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD R9 270 (2GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
